mainRfq.contactDescription: 您的联系方式可以帮助我们的团队快速讨论细节，提供更快捷、更量身定制的报价。
mainRfq.description: Agri Sung 帮助您找到合适的农业供应商，并为您的采购需求谈判最佳价格。
mainRfq.detailPlaceholder: 输入产品详细信息（颜色、尺寸、材料等及其他规格要求）
mainRfq.emailPlaceholder: 我们将在24小时内通过电子邮件回复您
mainRfq.productNamePlaceholder: 例如：榴莲、芒果、百香果、腰果、椰子……
mainRfq.successMessage: 我们将在24小时内通过电子邮件 {email} 联系您。
mainRfq.title: 告诉供应商您的需求

signUp.title: 注册

coreValuesSection.desc1: We believe in doing business the right way, with transparency and trust.
coreValuesSection.desc2: We empower our partners—from farmers to suppliers and customers.
coreValuesSection.desc3: Embracing new ideas, we leverage technology to simplify the supply chain.
coreValuesSection.desc4: Our decisions are guided by data to ensure efficiency and continuous improvement.
coreValuesSection.title: Our Core Values

differenceSection.desc: Through our innovative approach, we create systems that connect key stakeholders across the agricultural value chain, enabling seamless collaboration. Our transparent, data-driven processes,combined with deep local expertise, global expansion capabilities, and end-to-end international supplychain service, enable us to:
differenceSection.diff1: Empower global customers to source high-quality agricultural products from Vietnam with ease.
differenceSection.diff2: Assist Vietnamese suppliers in expanding their reach, making their products accessible to markets worldwide.
differenceSection.diff3: Provide end-to-end international supply chain solutions - from sourcing and certification to delivery - ensuring smooth, reliable, and efficient operations across borders.
differenceSection.title: How We Make a Difference

heroSection.desc: To elevate Vietnamese agricultural products to the global stage through our digital B2B marketplace, ensuring excellence, convenience, and innovation at every step of the process
heroSection.title: Reliable Sourcing of Vietnam's Finest Products

marketplaceSection.desc1: Agri Sung is a leading B2B marketplace dedicated to connecting Vietnamese suppliers with global markets. We empower Vietnamese producers to showcase and export their high-quality products, creating valuable opportunities for international customers to access high quality agricultural products from Vietnam.
marketplaceSection.desc2: Through our end-to-end international supply chain management service, we ensure exceptional, tailored support to meet the unique needs of both suppliers and customers. With seamless, data-driven processes, we deliver a reliable and efficient experience for every partner in the global value chain.
marketplaceSection.title: Marketplace at Our Core (for customers)

missionSection.desc: To elevate Vietnamese agricultural products to the global stage through our digital B2B marketplace, ensuring excellence, convenience, and innovation at every step of the process.
missionSection.title: Our Mission

whoAreWeSection.desc1: We are a dedicated B2B marketplace, connecting the finest agricultural products from Vietnam with customers around the globe. Focusing on the export of both fresh and processed goods, we are committed to maintaining high standards of quality and innovation.
whoAreWeSection.desc2: Our comprehensive, end-to-end international supply chain service enhances our offerings by ensuring seamless processes and timely deliveries from suppliers in Vietnam to customers worldwide.
whoAreWeSection.title: Reliable Sourcing of Vietnam's Finest Products

whySection.desc: “Agri” signifies our strong foundation in agriculture, while “Sung” embodies prosperity and happiness. Agri Sung represents our vision to cultivate growth and success for everyone we work with, from thefields of Vietnam to dining tables around the globe.
whySection.title: Why “Agri Sung”?

aside.rfqTitle: 找不到您想要的产品？发布定制请求以获得准确报价。

shared.address: 越南胡志明市富润区第二坊范溪龙街462号，邮编：700000
shared.description: Agri Sung - 越南采购公司，凭借对优质农场区域的访问、与顶级供应商的合作伙伴关系，以及可靠的声誉脱颖而出。我们的使命是将最优质的越南农产品带到全球市场，确保每一步的质量和可持续性。
shared.title: Agri Sung
